game.name: Kung Pao Chicken Sara’s Cooking Class
game.description:
Sara loves to stay in the kitchen area and keep practicing new recipe every week. Today, she wants to prepare an extremely popular Chinese dish – Kung Pao Chicken in her friendly Sara Cooking Class. In this free online cooking game that comes under the category of Girls, you will be able to learn how to cook a famous Chinese dish with the help of peanuts, vegetables and pepper. You will surely enjoy and have huge fun while helping this cute girl to complete a fantastic job in the shortest possible time.

Sara dish is packed full of flavor and spice and ready to give you a lip-smacking smell. Being expert in cooking, she will teach you properly how to prepare this scrumptious eastern dish in the shortest possible time. It is an extremely popular chicken meal with delicious spices and crispy vegetables. All you need to do is focus on how to collect all of the ingredients and mix them in the exact amount as per Sara instructions. With her proper instructions, you are sure to prepare this recipe very soon.

Sara is a lovely and beautiful girl who always feel happy to help people cook different recipes. A delicious chicken recipe that you will learn through this cool flash game can be served in front of your friends and family on various occasions. Play this free online cooking game for girls today to appease your guests tomorrow! Use all the necessary tools and ingredients to prepare a scrumptious chicken kung pao.
